mapper.insert: INSERT INTO prj_reply(rno, bno, reply, replyer_id, replyer_name) VALUES(reply_seq.nextval, #{bno}, #{reply}, #{replyer_id}, #{replyer_name})
mapper.update: UPDATE prj_reply SET reply = #{reply}, updateDate = SYSDATE WHERE rno = #{rno}
mapper.select: SELECT rno, bno, reply, replyer_id, replyer_name, replyDate, updateDate FROM prj_reply WHERE bno = #{bno} ORDER BY rno ASC
